00006 #include "countStrInLhs.h"

00009 int countStrInLhs( const char* str, const char * equations )
00010 {
00011   // Look only on LHS of equations
00012   int n = 0;
00013   char * dup = strdup( equations );
00014   char * lhs = NULL;
00015   char * rhs  = NULL;
00016   lhs = strtok( dup, "=" );
00017   while( lhs != NULL )
00018     {
00019       if( strstr( lhs, str ) != NULL )
00020         ++n;
00021       rhs = strtok( NULL, "\n" );
00022       lhs = strtok( NULL, "=" );
00023     }
00024   delete [] dup;
00025   return n;
00026 }
